sentences.sContent: Surgeons have successfully transplanted a liver into a four-year-old boy.
sentences.sCn: 外科医生成功地给一个四岁的男孩移植了肝脏。

sentences.sContent: I have to transplant the begonias.

synos.tran: [林]移植；移植器官；被移植物；移居者

phrases.pCn: 心脏移植；心脏移植手术

remMethod.val: trans(转移) ＋ plant(种植) → 移植

trans.tranCn: 移植（器官、皮肤等）；移植，移种（植物）
trans.tranOther: to move an organ, piece of skin etc from one person’s body and put it into another as a form of medical treatment
